intersects.description: queries streets by polygon data and returns GeoJSON output of all intersecting features
examples:
$ shst intersects polygon.geojson --out=output.geojson
  🌏 Loading polygon...
  🗄️ Loading SharedStreets tiles...
  🔍 Searching data...

match.description: matches point and line features to sharedstreets refs
examples:
$ shst match points.geojson --out=matched_points.geojson --portProperties
  🌏  Loading points...
  ✨  Matching 3 points...
  🎉  Matched 2 points... (1 unmached)

portProperties.name: portProperties
portProperties.description: port existing feature properties preceeded by "og_"

bearingField.name: bearingField
bearingField.description: name of optional point property containing bearing in decimal degrees
